name: [OLD] Kit: broken edition
description:
NOTE: THIS IS AN OLD BUILD! It does not, and will not represent the final project as anything in this build has been completely scrapped in favor of starting fresh.

I recently restarted an old project from a few months ago. I thought I'd release the old version as it had several levels complete, and had a built in end goal already for a sort of demo. everything in this build represents about half a months worth of work give or take. It has a built in speedrun timer and death counter. I think my best was 0 deaths and 1:11 roughly, see if you can beat my time I guess?

Anyways, the new build is coming along well and being made even faster than this one mostly because its been months since I've made this version and I've learnt a fair amount. hope someone gets some kind of enjoyment out of this.
